mapper.sql: ID, NAME, JOB, EMAIL, PHONE, COMPANY, ADDRESS, DEAL, OPERATOR, DEAL_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into O_FEEDBACK (ID, NAME, JOB, EMAIL, PHONE, COMPANY, ADDRESS, DEAL, OPERATOR, DEAL_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deal,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

ID,

mapper.update:
update O_FEEDBACK
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL = #{deal,jdbcType=CHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEAL_TIME = #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
